import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';

The stardust update allows you to create your own [native tokens](/introduction/stardust/explanations/what_is_stardust/tokenization#native-tokens)
Native tokens are minted by a so-called Foundry. The Foundry allows you to specify a max supply once and change the circulating supply.

You can also specify some custom metadata in the foundry output or follow a standard like [IRC30](/tips/tips/TIP-0030).
To create a Foundry you need an Alias Output which owns it. This Alias Output only needs to be generated once and can own multiple foundries.

<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Check the account's balance for an [`Alias Output`](/tips/tips/TIP-0018#alias-output)
   it can use to create the [native tokens](/tips/tips/TIP-0018#native-tokens-in-outputs).
   If the account doesn't have any, it will create one.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.rs#L47-L65
```

</div>

3. Define the [`CreateNativeTokenParams`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.CreateNativeTokenParams.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.rs#L72-L77
```

</div>

4. Create the native token using the [`Account.create_native_token()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.create_native_token)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.rs#L79
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Check the account's balance for an [`Alias Output`](/tips/tips/TIP-0018#alias-output)
   it can use to create the [native tokens](/tips/tips/TIP-0018#native-tokens-in-outputs).
   If the account doesn't have any, it will create one.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.ts#L37-L55
```

</div>

3. Define `Irc30Metadata` and the [`CreateNativeTokenParams`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/CreateNativeTokenParams.md).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.ts#L59-L70
```

</div>

4. Prepare the transaction that will create the native token using the
   [`Account.prepareCreateNativeToken()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#preparecreatenativetoken)
   function and send the prepared transaction using the [`Account.send()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#send)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.ts#L72-L73
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html), get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Check the account's balance for an [`Alias Output`](/tips/tips/TIP-0018#alias-output)
   it can use to create the [native tokens](/tips/tips/TIP-0018#native-tokens-in-outputs).
   If the account doesn't have any, it will create one.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.py#L26-L33
```

</div>

3. Define the `CreateNativeTokenParams`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.py#L41-L49
```

</div>

4. Prepare the transaction that will create the native token using the
   [`Account.prepare_create_native_token()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#prepare_create_native_token)
   function and send the prepared transaction using the [`Account.send()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#send)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.py#L51-L52
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Transaction sent: 0x3e7fe86a2b01a7006fe037249be51852d298d32df69507140d3b41c1a6d7fb90
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0xca4f8150014bc548214be6b02bed3b7d43041adef8838965815a367f73c7272d
Account synced
Preparing transaction to create native token...
Transaction sent: 0xcfc5ffae0c7be8cfb7c334d6f6bb39a2ddff612c9a9048c88e3d9158f7cc4832
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0x558c0dcede60609bbb641e9f1d9a7802b48a3c3d5827328a054385140d447436
Created token: 0x089dc1b964591b15819ef1912fab48c001fed4558b37766dfa5daa512495d5b25a0100000000
Account synced
```
